import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import NoteContex from '../context/notes/NoteContex' const NoteItem = (props) => { const {note}=props const context=useContext(NoteContex) const{deleteNote}=context return (
{note.title}
{deleteNote(note._id)}} >

{note.description}.

) } export default NoteItem
